Drinker of Souls.Ability Description: Automatically absorb energy from dying / recently slain foes
Drinker of Souls.Rules Text: A dying creature rolls BOD vs. WIL to resist failure or tie results in its death. This maneuver automatically succeeds against a target that has been dead for up to 5 rounds on 6+ rounds no effect. Heal 1 stamina if at full stamina heal 1 health if at full health and stamina gain 1 temporary HP.

Enduring Presence.Ability Description: Damage dampening discharge to mitigate one hit
Enduring Presence.Rules Text: Subjects gain 1 damage dampening. Discharge: one subject of the aura gets 1+(quantity of subjects) damage dampening against one attack.

Fear Aura.Ability Description: This fear aura triggers on any aggressive action.
Fear Aura.Rules Text: You may attempt a free intimidation check against all enemies within (CHA) squares once per round as part of an attack. The effects of the intimidation check apply after the attack is resolved.

Feedback Aura.Ability Description: Nearby enemies subject to damage when you are wounded
Feedback Aura.Rules Text: Enemies within (CHA*2.5 ft) resist (damage you took) as psychic damage with mental soak.

For the Greater Good.Ability Description: Willing allies may take damage to heal the aura user
For the Greater Good.Rules Text: During your turn as a nonaction target willing ally within CHA*5 loses 1 HP or 2 Stam and you gain 1HP or 2 Stam.

Glare of the noonday sun.Ability Description: nonlethal damage vs. everything at start of your turn
Glare of the noonday sun.Rules Text: All creatures within (CHA/2 + RANK) ft (including you) must soak (BOD/2 + RANK) fire damage at the start of your turn. This damage is always nonlethal.

Mana Leech.Ability Description: Name a color. All drain using abilities except for the named color are subject to 1 higher drain. Whenever such an ability is used roll 1 die and heal HITS drain.
Mana Leech.Rules Text: Name a color. All abilities with drain used within the aura except for the named color may take +RANK drain. If they don't roll 1 die and heal HITS drain and deal HITS drain to the ability user.

Menacing Presence.Ability Description: Penalty to enemies trying to attack allies other than you
Menacing Presence.Rules Text: Enemies within (CHA*5 feet) take (CHA) penalty to their attack pools if targeting anything but you. If enemies are not aware of you this aura does not affect them.

Natural Shielding.Rules Text: All allies within the aura gain +RANK/2 +1 armor and RANK+2 dice on rolls to resist effects originating from other recipients of this aura.

Never surrender.Rules Text: Allies do not fall unconscious when a damage track is filled. They still die from overflow.

No Retreat!.Ability Description: Your inspiration prevents enemies from being able to withdraw safely
No Retreat!.Rules Text: Enemies within your zone of control provoke attacks of opportunity from you when using any form of movement even if they would not normally provoke.  At rank 2 all enemies within CHA*5 always provoke attacks of opportunity (from threatening allies) when moving through an allies zone of control. All forms of movement including instant teleportation provoke. Allies must also be within this aura to gain these benefits.

Ralling Spirit.Ability Description: Your combat prowess brings inspiration to your allies their morale confers healing
Ralling Spirit.Rules Text: When you make a successful melee attack you may heal an ally within CHA*5 ft RANK*2 meat or RANK*4 stam health. (This healing is subject to normal healing rules.)

Rally Morale.Ability Description: Your allies may use your willpower in place of their own or their willpower + RANK (whichever is higher) when resisting most effects. This does not apply to drain checks.
Rally Morale.Rules Text: Your allies may use your willpower in place of their own or their willpower + RANK (whichever is higher) when resisting most effects. This does not apply to drain checks.

Rallying Aura.Ability Description: bonus vs. fear and charm bonus on combat
Rallying Aura.Rules Text: Resist fear resist charm combat; +1 die per rank

Skill Teamwork.Ability Description: Boost allies' skills for skills you have high ranks in
Skill Teamwork.Rules Text: Rank 1: up to 2Rank 2: up to 4Rank 3: up to 6Rank 4: up to 8

Slow Aura.Ability Description: increase initiative cost of enemy actions
Slow Aura.Rules Text: Enemy's actions cost 1+(RANK) more initiative so long as they are within (5*CHA feet) of you. If another effect would inflict a penalty on the initiative cost of actions only the highest penalty applies.

Warleader.Ability Description: Allies can attack right after you with a bonus.
Warleader.Rules Text: The first time you attack each turn all allies within range may take their turn immediately after yours. An ally who chooses to do so may only move or make attacks during that turn. Allies who make use of this ability gain a stacking refreshing +1 dice to all attack block parry rolls until the end of their next turn. The maximum benefit of this bonus is your CHA.

All outta Bubblegum.Rules Text: Body BuffRANK-1 damage dampeningignore RANK points of wound penalty+RANK vs. knockdown disarm trip resisting grappleMelee attacks trigger knockdownEnemies that fail to escape your grapples take damage as if you made the grapple attack action against themIgnore half an enemy's armor with your grapple attacks

Arcane Conduit.Rules Text: Body BuffCasting a spell generates a mana charge.Charges may be expended as follows2-Spent in place of init costs on a spell modifier (per 5)2-Spent in place of init costs on counterspelling/redirecting (per 5)2-Spent to mitigate a counterspell/redirect attempt against one of your spells (-3 dice to opposed attempt per)Max charges = 2*RANK These charges decay after one minute of not generating nor using charges. If you would overflow your limit on charges take drain equal to the overflow amount. You shed sparking magical light (as a torch) while you have at least 2 charges.At Rank 2: Centering generates 1 charge every point of drain you take from spellcasting generates 1 charge.At Rank 3: All charge generation is increased by +1

Avatar of Malice.Ability Description: Empower attacks lifesteal ignore full defense
Avatar of Malice.Rules Text: Body buff. All damage you deal is applied as Dark damage post mitigation. You ignore enemiesâ€™ full defense. Whenever your melee attack deals damage to one or more targets heal 1. This healing is exempt from healing drain.Weakness 3 to radiant. You treat all incoming dark damage and dark damage you suffer as normal damage. After damage is calculated against you you may move up to 2 points of it to the delayed track. At the end of the round you suffer all the delayed damage as physical damage.

Bastion.Rules Text: Simple Action. Increase damage dampening by RANK. Reduce the starting power of your attacks by RANK.

Blessed Light of Dawn.Rules Text: Body BuffAll your healing effects heal for 1 additional pointYou may spend 1L in place of any drain you suffer as part of casting a healing effect this also mitigates all drain for recipients of this healing effect. you may take 3 on all healing rollsExcess points of healing generate Reserve dice at a 1:1 ratio for the recipient of your healing effects that last for one minute or until used on any roll. If Reserve dice would be received while there are already existing dice the new quantity overwrites if it is higher otherwise it just refreshes the one minute timer. Resist 3 acid resist 3 fire resist 3 lightning.Gain +6 dice to see through magical effectsTreat all light conditions as optimal for your vision.You may trigger healing effects as an interrupt at (5)

Brambleward.Ability Description: Ward against targeted magical effects discharge for a burst of strength
Brambleward.Rules Text: Simple action. Gain +3*RANK against targeted magical effects until the end of this round. You may discharge this effect to get +2 STR *RANK on one attempted action.

Charge Weapon.Ability Description: Hold a spell in a weapon to be discharged upon striking
Charge Weapon.Rules Text: You can cast spells into your weapon(s). The spells are discharged upon striking an opponent one at a time in the order they were cast in. -Spells that normally target dodge automatically hit with 0 net hits. In the case of AoE effects produced off this (RULING NEEDED)-Spells that target mental or physical resolve as normal.Casting a spell into a weapon is a simple action. For every simple action spent since the start of your last turn casting spells into your weapon(s) you may cast an additional spell as part of the simple action. You may store up to (cast stat) spells at one time and you can only store spells of up to 1+(cast stat / 2) force.If the weapon leaves your possession for a minute all charges dissipate. Stored charges dissipate an hour after the last charge was added.

Conjure weapon / armor.Ability Description: Summon personalized weapon / armor functions while in your keeping but phases out for others
Conjure weapon / armor.Rules Text: Binding weapons and/or armor is accomplished during one hour of downtime. You may summon any or all of the bound weapons/armor as a free action or dismiss them as a free action. When an item is dismissed it exists in a pocket dimension and access can be prevented by effects that limit extradimensional travel. Dismissed items count as attended. You may summon bound equipment back to you granted it has been at most one minute since you last made contact with it. If it is attended the attender must be willing. You are aware of the general direction your bound equipment is in if you become separated from it. You may bind one set of armor and (two one handed weapons or one two handed weapon) per rank.

Crisp and Cauterize.Ability Description: Dealing direct fire damage procs a healHealing procs a firebolt
Crisp and Cauterize.Rules Text: Body Buff.Whenever your attack or ability deals fire damage to a target you may heal an ally within 60ft for up to an equivalent amount of health.Whenever you heal an ally you may generate a single target ranged firebolt as per Elemental Blast at FORCE = (healing spell FORCE) - 2This ability cannot trigger itself

Displacer.Ability Description: You occupy two adjacent squares appearing to flicker between them.
Displacer.Rules Text: Body BuffGain +3 on all defensive checks (not mental or physical resist)You occupy two adjacent squares.You may act from either position that you occupy.You may pass through thin obstacles at the cost of 5ft of movement.You can pay (5) init to solidify in one spot at any time or a simple action during your turn stabilizing the effect until you spend a free action to resume it.

Duty's Ward.Ability Description: Move to punish those who threaten your selected ally
Duty's Ward.Rules Text: This buff links you and one ally (within 60ft on activation) and lasts 24 hours or until one recipient opts to dismiss it as a complex action. You are aware of when the linked ally is threatened or hurt. You can sense the rough direction the linked ally is in. Enemies taking actions that target the ally but not you provoke attacks of opportunity. Such a triggering action also grants 10ft of movement if that would allow you to move to threaten the triggering enemy.

Elemental Body (Acid).Rules Text: Gain for the duration Resist Acid: 3*RANK Whenever you are struck by a corporeal attack that does at least 1 point of damage all adjacent creatures must soak (armor soak) acid damage equal to  (BOD/2 + 2*RANK). You may channel the acid into an area attack centered on you (you are unaffected by this attack) with (BOD/2*5 ft radius). DV = (BOD/2+2* RANK)(resolve as a spellcast or attack as desired). Doing so ends the benefits of Elemental Body. This is a body buff. Activating this buff is a simple action channeling the acid is a complex action.

Elemental Body (Cold).Rules Text: Gain for the durationResist Cold: 3Creatures that start their turn adjacent lose RANK initiative as if suffering damage from a cold effect. Resistance to cold mitigates this at a 1:1 ratio.You may channel the chill into an area attack centered on you (you are unaffected by this attack) with (BOD/2*5 ft radius). DV = (BOD/2+ 2*RANK)(resolve as a spellcast or attack as desired). Doing so ends the benefits of Elemental Body. This is a body buff. Activating this buff is a simple action channeling the cold is a complex action.

Elemental Body (Dark).Rules Text: Gain for the duration Resist Dark: 3*RANK Whenever you are struck by a corporeal attack that does at least 1 point of damage you produce an obscuring miasma in your square that lasts until the end of the round. You may channel the darkness into an obscuring miasma centered on you radius = (BOD/2 -1) that lasts until the end of the next round. The miasma blocks all light for everyone except you. Doing so ends the benefits of Elemental Body. This is a body buff. Activating this buff is a simple action channeling the darkness is a complex action.

Elemental Body (Earth).Rules Text: Gain for the durationDamage Dampening: 1You may channel the strength of earth to mitigate one physical attack. Gaining an additional 2*RANK Damage Dampening. Doing so ends the benefits of Elemental Body after resolving the damage for that attack. This is a body buff. Activating this buff is a simple action channeling the earth is a nonaction.

Elemental Body (Fire).Rules Text: Gain for the durationResist Fire: 3*RANKCreatures that start their turn adjacent must save or catch fire as if affected by a (BOD/2+RANK) fire attack. At the end of each round adjacent objects save or catch fire.You may channel the fire into an area attack centered on you (you are unaffected by this attack) with (BOD/2*5 ft radius). DV = (BOD/2+ 2*RANK)(resolve as a spellcast or attack as desired). Doing so ends the benefits of Elemental Body. This is a body buff. Activating this buff is a simple action channeling the fire is a complex action.

Elemental Body (Lightning).Rules Text: Gain for the durationResist Lightning: 3*RANKCreatures that are adjacent to you that take lightning damage take an additional point of lightning damage as if struck by a separate lightning effect. This ability cannot trigger itself.You may channel the lightning into a line attack originating from you with up to (BOD*10 ft length). DV = (BOD/2+ 2*RANK)(resolve as a spellcast or attack as desired). You may teleport to the farthest square of the target area. Using the attack function ends the benefits of Elemental Body. This is a body buff. Activating this buff is a simple action channeling the lightning is a complex action.

Elemental Body (Radiant).Rules Text: Gain for the duration Resist Radiant: 3*RANK Whenever you are struck by a corporeal attack that does at least 1 point of damage all adjacent creatures must avoid automatic blinding (until end of round) dodge or physical res vs. (BOD/2+rank-2) automatic hits. You may channel the radiance into an area attack centered on you (you are unaffected by this attack) with ((BOD/2+1)*5 ft radius) resolve as an attack or spellcast as desired. This attack does no damage may be dodged or physically resisted and only requires 3 net hits to blind (blinding until end of next round). This a. Doing so ends the benefits of Elemental Body. This is a body buff. Activating this buff is a simple action channeling the acid is a complex action.

Envenom Weapons.Rules Text: Damage adjusted by -2Victim injured by weapon rolls to physical soak venom at end of round DV = your BOD. As usual for poison effects subsequent applications of the poison during the same round raise the end of round DV by 1.

Fleetfoot Blessing.Ability Description: 1 temp hp movespeed bonus while this temp hp lasts
Fleetfoot Blessing.Rules Text: grant 1 temp HP increase your movement speed by 10 for 10 rounds. Simple action.

Imbue Weapon (Acid).Ability Description: Complex action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -3
Imbue Weapon (Acid).Rules Text: Simple action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -1

Imbue Weapon (Cold).Ability Description: Complex action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -3
Imbue Weapon (Cold).Rules Text: Simple action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -1

Imbue Weapon (Dark).Ability Description: Complex action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -3
Imbue Weapon (Dark).Rules Text: Simple action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -1

Imbue Weapon (Fire).Ability Description: Complex action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -3
Imbue Weapon (Fire).Rules Text: Simple action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -1

Imbue Weapon (Lightning).Ability Description: Complex action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -3
Imbue Weapon (Lightning).Rules Text: Simple action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -1

Martial Spirit.Ability Description: No aura two stances combine maneuvers
Martial Spirit.Rules Text: Body BuffYou may not have an aura activeYou may have two stances activeYou may combine two maneuvers as part of one action where both could apply. If they both have initiative costs you only need to pay the higher one.

Press your luck.Ability Description: Spend (2?3?) points of luck for the rest of the round all your dice explode
Press your luck.Rules Text: Nonaction. Spend 2 luck For the rest of the round all your dice explode.

Purging Bubble.Ability Description: 1 temp hp 1 purge roll on apply
Purging Bubble.Rules Text: Simple action.  Target ally may immediately (re)roll against a temporary negative condition. There is no penalty for failing this roll. Target gains 1 temp hp

Shadow Partner.Ability Description: Create a fragile clone of yourself with half stats that mirrors your actions
Shadow Partner.Rules Text: Free action spend 1 L. Create a shadowy clone of yourself in an adjacent square. It acts on your initiative count has half your dicepool for any roll before modifiers. The clone cannot spend initiative on any actions nor can it spend luck. The clone has its own health and cannot be healed taking all damage as lethal. The clone does not suffer wound penalties. You can perceive everything your clone perceives. Outside of these limitations your clone functions with your abilities.

Shared fate.Rules Text: Complex Action. Touch range targets ally and self. For the duration all damage suffered by either recipient of this buff is split equally (primary target takes higher value in case of odd valued damage). Split damage after all resistances and rolls are concluded.

Simple action to apply element to attend.AbilityNames: Simple action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -3(Elemental damage ignores half the target's armor by default)
Simple action to apply element to attend.Ability Description: Complex action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -3
Simple action to apply element to attend.Rules Text: Simple action to apply element to attended weapons dismiss as free action.Changes weapon damage type to element.Damage adjusted by -3(Elemental damage ignores half the target's armor by default)

Soulward.Ability Description: Spend X health get 2X temp hp
Soulward.Rules Text: Simple Action. Spend X health to gain 2X temp hp.

Swarmform.Ability Description: Shapeshift into a cohesive swarm of small creatures
Swarmform.Rules Text: Gain +3 bonus (defense roll only) vs. single target attacks and effectsTake -5 penalty (defense and soak) vs. area attacks and effectsDamage taken from single target attacks cannot exceed 5You may disperse/condense into a swarm as a simple action.

The Quick and The Dead.Ability Description: boost dodge take more damage when hit
The Quick and The Dead.Rules Text: Simple Action. Gain RANK free hits on all dodge rolls. Your damage dampening is reduced by (1+2*RANK).

Titan Armor.Rules Text: Simple Action. Gain 3 to your soak dicepool per RANK for RANK*10 rounds. Your max speed is reduced by 10. This is a body buff.

All in.Ability Description: Burn initiative for a powerful strike
All in.Rules Text: Spend the rest of your initiative as part of an attack. Gain +1 free hit for every (10) spent in this way rounding up.

Assassinate.Rules Text: Enemies treat your initative as 10 higher for purposes of awareness during surprise rounds. Attacks against unaware enemies gain one automatic hit.

Assisted Escape.Ability Description: Target an ally they may move up to their movement speed.  After moving apply temp hp.
Assisted Escape.Rules Text: Target ally may move up to their walking speed after moving they gain 1 temp hp

Avalanche of Blades.Rules Text: (10) Make a melee attack if this attack doesn't miss make another attack at a -4 penalty to all rolls against the same target repeat until missing.

Balance the Scales.Rules Text: (Touch) Equalize wounds with one ally. If there are an odd number of physical and/or nonlethal wounds you choose who receives the odd numbered wound.

Blinding Bulwark.Ability Description: Blocking enemies has a chance to blind them
Blinding Bulwark.Rules Text: Spend (5) on block to roll a CHA/2 DV attack with spellcasting or weapon skill vs. attacker's mental resist. Target soaks with mental soak and is blinded for a number of rounds equal to the damage the attack would do.

Blinding Strike.Ability Description: Attack at a penalty blinds target
Blinding Strike.Rules Text: Make an attack net hits do not contribute to damage. Target rolls passive physical resist vs. half DV. On failure is blinded for net hits turns.

Blink.Rules Text: Free Action teleport up to your speed to a square within line of sight. 10 round cooldown______________________________________Free Action teleport up to your speed to a square within line of sight. 1 round cooldownSimple Action teleport up to 10x your speed to a square within line of sight. cooldown.______________________________________Free Action teleport up to your speed to a square within line of sight.Simple Action teleport up to 10x your speed to a square within line of sight. OR teleport up to 10' not limited by line of sight. 1 round cooldown.Complex Action teleport up to 100x your speed to a square within line of sight. OR teleport up to your speed not limited by line of sight. 10 round cooldown. Note: any usage puts the ABILITY on cooldown not the individual function.

Bloom Field.Ability Description: Spawn and manipulate blooms for battlefield options
Bloom Field.Rules Text: Simple action: Spawn (BOD) buds on the ground within 50ft. Buds die if you go 100ft from them or one minute passes.Free action: Command one or all buds (same command)- Spawn bramble patch: Creates a 15ft x 15ft bramble patch centered on the bud. The brambles are 7ft high and cost quadruple movement for enemies. Allies move normally through the brambles and get superior cover. This causes the bud to expire.- Engulf: Bud attempts to grapple adjacent enemy using your grapple values. On success the target is grappled and the bud automatically sustains the grapple. dealing damage as normal until the target is free. When the target dies or gets free the bud expires.- Teleport: Teleport to a spot adjacent to any bud you may only do this starting from adjacent to a bud. This does not consume the bud.Simple action or (5): Create a bud on your location and teleport as above.

Bola Arrow.Rules Text: Grapple trip disarm with arrow as part of an attack don't gain STR on damage.(weapon skill + STR - 4 for dicepool on combat maneuvers)

Breathstealing Blow.Rules Text: Make a melee attack. If successful net hits do not contribute to damage. Target rolls passive physical res vs. DV. On failure is silenced for net hits turns.

Burnout.Ability Description: Roll an init die twice lose access to that init die for the following round. 2 round cooldown.
Burnout.Rules Text: Roll an init die twice lose acces to that init die for the following round

Butterknifing.Rules Text: (5) as an additional cost on an attack against an inanimate or attended object. Treat the object's barrier rating as 5 lower.

Clarion Call.Ability Description: Grant allies option to take extra action when downing an enemy
Clarion Call.Rules Text: Nonaction after your attack renders an opponent unconsciousAll allies within CHA*5 ft may spend (5) and make a single attack or move up to their speed this movement does not count towards the round's max movement.

Counter Charge.Ability Description: When an enemy is charging you may charge to intercept.
Counter Charge.Rules Text: (10) when an enemy makes a charge attack charge the enemy during their movement attack them on hit also make an opposed STR check on success the enemy stops moving and does not get to attack.

Counterspell.Ability Description: (10) as interrupt attempt to counter a spell
Counterspell.Rules Text: (10) as interrupt attempt to counter a spell. Roll Cast stat + spellcasting skill + other bonuses vs. the spellcaster's roll in place of a normal resistance check.

Cratering Charge.Rules Text: (5) in addition to your charge make a secondary attack at STR/2 against all adjacent targets full dice pool vs. each target.

Crushing Descent.Ability Description: Bonus for attacks made while falling
Crushing Descent.Rules Text: Gain +1 die to an attack made while falling or diving per 10 fallen as part of the action. Capped at your BOD

Dancing Weapon.Ability Description: enchant a weapon to float and attack enemies
Dancing Weapon.Rules Text: Simple action or (5) after attacking with a melee weapon. Release one held melee weapon and choose an enemy the weapon pursues and attacks that enemy until the end of the round. The weapon acts on your turn has a fly speed of 30' with perfect maneuverability uses your weapon skill for its attacks (benefits from tradition match but not your agility) and deals damage as if you were wielding it. At the end of the round the weapon moves 30' towards you dropping where it ends its movement if you do not have an open hand to grab it as a nonaction or if it fails to reach you.

Deflecting Dodge.Ability Description: Redirect attack that missed you to adjacent valid target.
Deflecting Dodge.Rules Text: Spend (5) to redirect an attack that you succesfully dodged to an adjacent valid target.

Desert Tempest.Ability Description: Twirl around the battlefield slicing foes as you move
Desert Tempest.Rules Text: (10) As part of this manuever move up to your speed. You may make a single melee attack against each enemy you become adjacent to; you may not attack the same foe more than once during this manuever.

Desperate Gambit.Ability Description: take off turn action as if previously readied
Desperate Gambit.Rules Text: (20) perform an action as an interrupt as if it were readied.

Devour Essence.Ability Description: Absorb some energy from a dying / recently slain foe
Devour Essence.Rules Text: Complex action touch targets a dead or dying creature. A dying creature rolls BOD vs. WIL to resist failure or tie results in its death. This maneuver automatically succeeds against a target that has been dead for up to 5 rounds on 6+ rounds no effect. Heal 1 stamina if at full stamina heal 1 health if at full health and stamina gain 1 temporary point of health/stam that is lost first. This point lasts for (Creature's BOD) hours.

Distant Echoes.Ability Description: Launch projectile sense general surroundings near projectile
Distant Echoes.Rules Text: Free action - you gain blindsense 10ft around the impact point of the projectile until the end of the turnSimple action - until the end of next round.

Drink Their Tears.Ability Description: Gain bonus for enemies that have recently taken damage
Drink Their Tears.Rules Text: Simple actionGain +1 dice to attack actions for each enemy in LoS that has taken damage in the past round. This lasts until the end of the next round.

Elemental Discharge.Ability Description: Discharge weapon buff boost power of one attack
Elemental Discharge.Rules Text: Discharge a weapon buff as part of an attack action with one or more weapons. All attacks made during this attack action retain the elemental damage type of the discharged buff  have +1DV and strike adjacent targets at half DV.

ethereal Spinerak.Ability Description: Simple Action. Until end of encounter an ally gains the power to fight ethereal andincoporeal creatures.  you may use this maneuver as an interrupt (5); if you do so you cannot use this ability again for 24-3*WIL hours.
ethereal Spinerak.Rules Text: Simple Action. Until end of encounter an ally gains the power to fight ethereal incoporeal  creatures.  You may use this maneuver as an interrupt (5). Once you trigger this ability it cannot be used again for 24-3*WIL hours.

Feigned opening.Ability Description: Fake an opening focusing your reactions upon the riposte to come
Feigned opening.Rules Text: As a free action you may start to feign an opening. While you are feigning you do not roll your REACTION for passive defense dodge or block. Add REACTION to all riposte rolls when feigning.

Feint.Ability Description: (5) attack special roll w/ various other contributing skills if successful + NET HITS to next attack against target
Feint.Rules Text: Make an attack as a simple action against a target that is perceiving you and add your sleight of hand to the dice pool. This attack does no damage if successful. Instead add your net hits to the dice pool of the next attack you make against the same target before the end of your next turn.

Fiery Rebirth.Rules Text: On death spend all your LUCK. You rise on the start of the next round healing each of stam/drain/health up to 2x(spent LUCK) if they were below it. For the next 10 rounds you gain 1 temp hp at the start of each round you have a fly speed equal to your movement speed you have (CHA*5/2) radius fire damage aura that enemies must soak your (CAST STAT) in fire damage at the end  of round. You may do fire damage with your attacks rather than the normal damage type if desired. Lastly you also have weakness to cold 3 for the duration.

Fight me.Ability Description: Allow your actions to provoke from target opponent they provoke if they attack you otherwise get a free intimidate vs. them
Fight me.Rules Text: Free action: Target opponent within your reach whose reach you are within. The next action you take this turn provokes an opportunity attack from the target. If they make the attack they provoke an opportunity attack from you. If they choose not to make the attack (lacking initiative or otherwise being unable to take such an action being unaware of you etc doesn't count) you make an intimidate check against them as a nonaction.

FIRE EVERYTHING.Rules Text: Spend all your initiative. At the end of the round regain as much initiative as you spent on this ability. All initiative costs are reduced by (2) until the end of the round. You may activate this ability at any time as a nonaction but only once per round.

Foil.Ability Description: Spend (10) or 1L in melee if enemy cannot pay (10) init they lose the action they were attempting.
Foil.Rules Text: Spend (10) or 1L in melee if enemy cannot pay (10) init they lose the action they were attempting. (needs balancing)

Folded Time.Ability Description: 1L pull yourself from the future for 1 round next round disappear as you are pulled back for a round.
Folded Time.Rules Text: 1L pull yourself from the future for 1 round next round disappear as you are pulled back for a round.

Force an opening.Ability Description: pay (5) on top of your attack full defense does not apply vs. this attack enemies may spend (5) to prevent this for themselves
Force an opening.Rules Text: (5) the next attack you make ignores an opponent's Full Defense. enemies may spend (5) to negate this per use.

Frenetic Boost.Rules Text: Flip a coin before rolling initiative. If heads gain +1 init die this round. If tails -1 init die this round.

Gouge.Ability Description: Attack that triggers a bleed that hurts on taking actions
Gouge.Rules Text: Make an attack net hits don't contribute to damage. This attack is soaked by physical soak. On a successful hit the target bleeds for NET HITS turns. While bleeding the target takes 1 health damage if they take a move or simple action 2 if they take a complex action. Magical healing or a medicine check vs. the remaining turns removes the bleed.

Ground shifting leap.Ability Description: Leap to a target cratering the earth in an aoe around
Ground shifting leap.Rules Text: As a complex action make a jump this is treated as a running jump even if you started from a standstill. Upon landing make a STR*2 check against the ground. if you surpass its barrier rating you break through and create a HITS/4 *5ft radius hole centered on you otherwise nothing happens.Malleable surface: if you fail to surpass the barrier rating (possibly due to the dirt ground being arbitrarily impassable vs. basic attacks for instance) you create a HITS/2 *5ft radius dent that is treated as difficult terrain and force all creatures in the area to make acrobatics checks against half your STR check or fall prone.

Guide Fate.Ability Description: Spend (5) to let an adjacent ally explode dice or reroll
Guide Fate.Rules Text: You have one fate reroll that you may trigger for an ally for (5) that functions the same a a reroll generated from spending luck. Whenever you would regain a point of luck this fate reroll refreshes.

Headsman.Ability Description: Attacking technique vs. prone targets. Bonus damage
Headsman.Rules Text: (5) You may attempt to decapitate a prone target with a melee weapon. The dice rolled for this attack explode and you ignore half the target's armor.

Herding assault.Ability Description: Hit does reduced damage force move your target NET HITS
Herding assault.Rules Text: Net hits do not contribute to damage. This attack is soaked with physical soak. move your target NET HITS if the attack hits.

Hit the Deck.Ability Description: Drop prone reroll defense vs indirect AoE
Hit the Deck.Rules Text: (5)You drop prone. Reroll a defense roll you just made against an indirect area attack

Inspire Perserverance.Ability Description: Give one/some allies an extra roll to end ongoing effects
Inspire Perserverance.Rules Text: 1: Complex action one ally may make another roll to end an ongoing effect as if rolling against it for the first time2: As 1 except as a Simple action3: As 2 except with 3 bonus dice. Also; Complex action up to CHA allies may make another roll to end an ongoing effect as if rolling against it for the first time.

Leaping Flame.Ability Description: Poof gone in thin air like a magic trick
Leaping Flame.Rules Text: Trigger: an enemy you are aware of within (twice your speed) resolves an attack against you.(5) Teleport to a location adjacent to the triggering enemy.

Lend a Distraction.Rules Text: (5) to assist an ally with a Con check producing a distraction for stealth purposes (hits as a penalty to opponent's dicepool) preventing distracted target from being able to take attacks of opportunity...

Lunge.Ability Description: Attacking technique with extra range and added movement. Bonus damage cannot attempt active defense until start of next turn.
Lunge.Rules Text: At the start of a lunge you may move up to two squares in a straight line this movement does not provoke attacks of opportunity. You are treated as charging for this attack (+2 dicepool). After attempting a lunge you may not attempt any active defense until the start of your next turn.

Make Time for That.Ability Description: Spend 1 luck gain 10 init spend this only on red abilities
Make Time for That.Rules Text: Spend 1 luck gain 10 init spend this only on red abilities. Nonaction

Mean Green Stompy Machine.Rules Text: Up to cha friendly targets get +6 on all dicepools involving STR or BOD +3 DV on weapon attacks that scale with STR ignore enemies' full defense. For each subject this benefit expires at the end of their turn. Free action (10)

Mirrored Edge.Rules Text: Make an attack with your weapon(s). Then make another attack for each consecutive turn beyond the first you have used this maneuver this round. (ex: third turn in a row make three attacks).

My body as a shield.Ability Description: (5) take a hit meant for an adjacent ally
My body as a shield.Rules Text: (5) When an adjacent ally would next be hit by an attack you are hit by that attack instead.

Necropotence.Rules Text: Spend X life and X Drain when rolling initiative you may reroll all dice of 2X or lower. Additionally you may pay 2 life and 1 Drain per (5) of the init cost of an action you otherwise do not have initiative for.

Ninjutsu Decoy.Ability Description: Set up a decoy at your position turn invisible
Ninjutsu Decoy.Rules Text: Complex actionmake a stealth roll and leave behind a convincing decoy. Decoy fades after sustaining one hit. Enemies may see through the decoy with an (OPPOSED CHECK). (COOLDOWN)

Painful Precision.Ability Description: Take 2 unresisted lethal damage to add one free hit to a roll
Painful Precision.Rules Text: Take 2 unresisted lethal damage to add one free hit to a roll before dice are rolled.

Phasing.Ability Description: Pass through walls of varying thickness
Phasing.Rules Text: As a simple action you may fully pass through thin materials and structures up to a few inches thick. Lead and other specific materials cannot be so bypassed._____________________________________As previous rank except you may pass through up to a foot in thickness._____________________________________As previous rank except you may pass through up to 10'_____________________________________You have a 30s pool of phasing recharges at 3s every 6s when not in use

Pinning Strike.Ability Description: Pin target to nearby surface harder to remove the larger the weapon is.
Pinning Strike.Rules Text: You may attempt to pin an enemy to a nearby surface. If you hit do no damage. Instead the enemy is pinned and must roll grapple or AGI + ESCAPE ARTIST vs. TOTAL HITS + (weapon size modifier) to escape. Every successive check gains 1 free hit to escape._____________________________________As previous rank except the target takes damage on hit and on escaping. Net hits do not contribute to damage on the initial attack._____________________________________As previous rank except you may target multiple adjacent enemies Impaling them together instead of to a surface. Net hits do not contribute to damage on the initial attack.

Prescient Teleport.Ability Description: Teleport anytime you damn well please
Prescient Teleport.Rules Text: (5) as a nonaction at any time. Resolve one of your teleportation abilities.

Pro X.Rules Text: Grant (+RANK) protection from color. Color selection is locked upon purchase of this ability. This benefit lasts for one minute or until you conffer Pro X on another target. Simple Action

Rain of Arrows.Ability Description: You can attack an area with arrows
Rain of Arrows.Rules Text: You can target up to AGI continguous squares with simultaneous ranged attacks each at -6 dicepool

Rain of Steel.Ability Description: Spend extra initiative become a maelstrom of weaponry for one round
Rain of Steel.Rules Text: Complex action. (5) All enemies within reach are subject to a melee attack from you at -5 dicepool. All enemies treat the area covered by your reach as difficult terrain. All enemies outside your reach that enter while Rain of Steel continues are subject to a single attack at -5. You are treated as on full parry while Rain of Steel persists. Rain of steel lasts until the end of the round.

Reactive Block.Ability Description: You may attempt a free block against enemies you have attacked in melee previously this round
Reactive Block.Rules Text: Once per round you may attempt a block at (0) against an enemy you have attacked this round.

Reckless Swing.Ability Description: Take dice pool penalty to improve damage or shave off enemy's dodge pool
Reckless Swing.Rules Text: For every -2 penalty you take when attacking with this maneuver add +1 to the damage value of the attack up to +AGI

Red Rover.Rules Text: Make a charging attack. Allies can spend (10) to also make a charging attack as an interrupt. If you spend (10) the cost for allies joining the charge becomes (5). Resolve all attacks after you and all allies have moved.

Redirect.Ability Description: Spend (5) after counterspelling to redirect spell
Redirect.Rules Text: Spend (5) after counterspelling to redirect spell

Retalliatory Strike.Rules Text: (5) when hit you may make an attack against the opponent that struck you in melee.

Revivify.Ability Description: Spend luck restore a recently deceased creature to life.
Revivify.Rules Text: Spend (2L) heal an ally for CAST STAT without inflicting healing drain. This effect can be used on creatures that have died within the past round returning them to life if the healing is sufficient to remove excess overflow. This effect requires you to be touching the target.

Second Chance.Rules Text: Spend 3L as an interrupt. Rewind your turn.

Second Wind.Rules Text: Roll BOD + WIL. For every 2 hits you gain 1 temp hp.

Shield Counter.Ability Description: When an enemy strikes bash him in the face first
Shield Counter.Rules Text: (5) when wielding a shield and an enemy in melee range is making an attack with your shield. The damage from the attack is the Target Number for the physical resist roll the enemy must make. If they fail the physical resist check their attack resolves as a miss.

Shifting Synapse.Ability Description: You may use your physical resist in place of your mental resist at a cost
Shifting Synapse.Rules Text: You may spend an additional (5) when rolling mental resistance to use your physical resistance instead.

Spatial Slip.Ability Description: boost dodge teleport after dodge roll
Spatial Slip.Rules Text: spend an additional (5) as part of a dodge. Gain +5 dice after resolving the dodge you may trigger one of your free action teleportation abilities as a nonaction.

Spell Reflection.Ability Description: Spend (5?10?) when successfully resisting a spell to redirect it
Spell Reflection.Rules Text: Spend (5) when you successfully resist a direct spell to choose a new target for the spell resolving it as if cast by the original caster.

Spread shot.Ability Description: You may attack multiple opponents as part of a single ranged attack
Spread shot.Rules Text: Make a ranged attack against however many targets you choose in a 90 degree cone within your first range increment splitting your dicepool among all targets.

Spring up.Rules Text: Stand up as free action that does not provoke attacks of opportunity. All your jumps are treated as having a running start.

Stalwart Vanguard.Ability Description: You always go last during an initiative pass gain (armor?)
Stalwart Vanguard.Rules Text: You may opt to act last in an initiative pass before initiative is rolled. If multiple creatures would act last tiebreak as usual with actual initiative rolls then REA and finally LUK. Gain +2 armor per rank until the start of the next initiative pass.

Stay death.Ability Description: Target ally (gains + on atk and ignores one lethal blow) until next initiative roll.
Stay death.Rules Text: Complex action. One ally within (CHA*10 ft) gains 1 die on all attack rolls. Negate the damage from the next attack that would reduce the subject's health below zero if this occurs the die bonus ends. 1L Trigger this ability as an interrupt.These benefits last until the next initiative roll.

Sunflask.Ability Description: Prepare (number) heals at dawn heals WHITE characters for more
Sunflask.Rules Text: Prepare (WIL) flasks at dawn. A character who consumes a flask rolls 2xBOD (or the creator of the sunflask rolls first aid) and heals up to that many hits taking drain as normal for magical healing. You gain +2 to the check if the recipient is a WHITE character.

Surge of Resilience.Rules Text: (5) or free action make another roll against a debilitating condition (i.e. stun) as if you were resisting it the first time. Success removes the condition.

Tactical Surge.Ability Description: 1L use a white maneuver immediately as though it was an interrupt.
Tactical Surge.Rules Text: 1L use a white maneuver immediately as though it was an interrupt.

Temporal Extortion.Ability Description: Spend life take your next turn
Temporal Extortion.Rules Text: Spend 2 life during your turn (nonaction) you act again after the end of this turn if you have the initiative to do so

Thunderous Impact.Ability Description: Can attack multiple opponents at range with thrown heavy weapon. AOE = STR + (3 if weapon is 2h) + rankTargeted area becomes difficult terrain if damage threshold is met. (Damage value + rank â‰¥ threshold)
Thunderous Impact.Rules Text: (5) Can attack multiple opponents at range with thrown heavy weapon. AOE = STR + (3 if weapon is 2h) + rankTargeted area becomes difficult terrain if damage threshold is met. (Damage value + rank â‰¥ threshold)

Time Dilation.Rules Text: Next round maximize all your initiative dice. You can spend 1 luck point to trigger this ability as a free action.

Toss.Ability Description: toss creature deal damage or enable ally to make attack
Toss.Rules Text: 1. You must have an enemy grappled or a willing adjacent ally2. Make a ranged attack with 1(ranges)3. If enemy base damage = (?body). If ally your net hits contribute to the dice pool on their attack

Trick shot.Ability Description: Not bending bullets but you can shoot around corners n such
Trick shot.Rules Text: At one point during the trajectory of your projectile you may have it take up to one 90 turn.

Triumphant Shout.Rules Text: (5) as a nonaction after your attack renders a creature dead or disabled. You may attempt an intimidation check against all opponents that can see both you and the aforementioned victim.

Twin Strike.Rules Text: (10) Make two attacks at full dice pool against single target. On one hit apply damage as normal. On two hits total net successes between both attacks and apply that on top of the damage for the less damaging weapon.

Twist the Blade.Ability Description: Followup attack if you strike an enemy that was not actively defending.
Twist the Blade.Rules Text: Trigger: an enemy takes damage from your light weapon melee attack and was not actively defending. Spend (5) as a nonaction. Make another attack with the same weapon at base DV 0 this attack cannot be actively defended against this attack has 50% armor penetration.

Vanguard Strike.Ability Description: You lead the attack your allies becoming more effective at helping you focus a target down.
Vanguard Strike.Rules Text: Make a melee attack net hits don't contributeto damage. The target is marked on hit and all allies attacking the marked target gain +1 hits when attacking the target. You may only have one target marked by vanguard strike at a time striking a new target changes the target. The target is no longer marked at the end of the next round.

Vault.Ability Description: Target is enchanted with the powers of flight for the round
Vault.Rules Text: Simple Action. One ally within (RANGE) gains a fly speed equal to their movement speed until the end of the round.

War stomp.Ability Description: Str check vs. balance checks knock enemies prone in AoE or stagger.
War stomp.Rules Text: Roll 2 * STR. All enemies within (STR/2) squares must roll higher on AGI + Gymnastics or be knocked prone.

Weather the blow.Ability Description: Spend initiative gain damage dampening reactively against one hit
Weather the blow.Rules Text: (5) as an interrupt gain damage dampening equal to half your BODY against one attack.

Whirlwind attack.Rules Text: You may attack any number of enemies in the one attack splitting your full dicepool among them. (Note that reach is an attack modifier and not innate to the dicepool thus it is added to every attack after the dicepool has been split)________________________As previous rank but you also gain the option to spend (10) Attack all enemies within reach.

Luck of the Hour.Ability Description: spend init in place of luck
Luck of the Hour.Rules Text: You may spend (10) per (L) for abilities that cost (L) instead of their normal cost

Mcguiver.Ability Description: For better or for worse things seem to unexplicably break or work when you mess with them
Mcguiver.Rules Text: You may attempt to fix or break mechanical and/or magical devices such as locks or crystal balls.  Who knows what will happen!

Bond of Pursuit.Ability Description: Mark enemy pursue and punish their ignorance of you in combat.
Bond of Pursuit.Rules Text: As a free action you may mark a target within (CHA*5)ft with your Bond of Pursuit. This mark persists for 24 hours or until the subject is slain. You may only have one subject marked at a time and cannot mark another while an older mark exists.Any mode of movement that takes the subject away from you while the subject is within your reach provokes an intercept at (0) before the movement is resolved. You may shift as a nonaction to follow the subject after it has moved or teleport as a nonaction if you possess capabilities at least matching that of the subject.

Vendetta.Ability Description: Declare vendetta target bonus vs. them penalties vs. other targets. Delay on new vendetta target if you fail to slay current one.
Vendetta.Rules Text: Nonaction. Spend (1) luck to declare a vendetta against a target within (RANGE). Gain 1 free hit on all attacks against that target while it is subject to your vendetta. It gains 1 free hit on all attacks against you while it is subject to your vendetta. Your vendetta ends when the target falls unconscious you fall unconscious or you spend (1) luck to change the target of your vendetta.

Caustic demise.Ability Description: Enemies killed by your acid abilities explode
Caustic demise.Rules Text: Enemies killed by your acid abiilities explode for FORCE damage to adjacent enemies

Centering Technique.Ability Description: By spending longer to cast a spell you reduce the drain that spell has on you.  You gain the ability to cast a spell over multiple rounds.
Centering Technique.Rules Text: You may extend the casting duration of a spell by a multiple of its base casting action. For each increment add half your WIL to the drain dicepool for this casting up to a total of 2*WIL contributed by this ability. For each interval you can increase the FORCE of the spell by up to 1 over the normal maximum FORCE. Casting at FORCE above your normal maximum causes drain damage to be physical instead of stamina damage.Possessing this ability removes WIL from your drain soak pool for all spells not cast with centering technique.

Contingency.Ability Description: Invest luck into holding spell until chosen trigger
Contingency.Rules Text: Spend 1 Luck you canâ€™t regain this point of luck while you have an active contingency. Cast a spell to be your contingency noting your current dicepool and other parameters resisting drain when creating this contingency. Set a condition under which the contingency will trigger...

Delayed Enhancement.Ability Description: You may delay the effects of a buff to begin at the start of the next round.
Delayed Enhancement.Rules Text: You may delay the effects of a buff to begin at the start of the next round by spending a free action as part of the action of activating the buff effect.

Echoing spell.Ability Description: Increase spell drain by 3 spell can be recast within one round as a nonaction on your turn
Echoing spell.Rules Text: You may Increase a spells drain by 3.  If you do the spell can be recast as a nonaction on your next turn drain is not rolled for this recast.

Fork.Ability Description: Cast a copy of a spell being cast
Fork.Rules Text: Spend (15) cast another copy of the spell

Frostborn.Ability Description: Deal 1 damage when your cold effects would reduce an opponent's initiative below zero
Frostborn.Rules Text: When your Cold effect would reduce an opponent's initiative to a value equal to or below 0 you also deal 1 cold damage this ability cannot trigger itself.

Irresistible Spell.Ability Description: (5) as a cost when casting spell this spell cannot be countered
Irresistible Spell.Rules Text: (5) as a cost when casting spell this spell cannot be countered

Lightning Rod.Ability Description: You can choose for your lightning damage to apply a static charge instead of potentially inflicting a stun. Reduce enemies lightning resistance by 1 for each static charge. You can consume charges to increase the DC of a stun you are attempting to inflict. You can consume charges for your lightning damage to chain.
Lightning Rod.Rules Text: You can choose for your lightning damage to apply a static charge instead of potentially inflicting a stun. Reduce enemies lightning resistance by 1 for each static charge. You can consume charges to increase the DC of a stun you are attempting to inflict by +1 for each charge. You can consume charges for your lightning damage to chain (3 charges per additional target targets of the initial effect cannot be targets of the chain).

Lingering (SPELL SCHOOL).Ability Description: Sustained spells of chosen school persist for up to RANK rounds after you stop sustaining them
Lingering (SPELL SCHOOL).Rules Text: Sustained spells of chosen school persist for up to RANK rounds after you stop sustaining them

Mass combustion.Ability Description: Enemies you set alight have a chance to set adjacent enemies alight each turn
Mass combustion.Rules Text: For enemies that you cause to burn at the start of their turn adjacent enemies must resist the current flame intensity with Armor Soak or catch on fire.

Multicast.Ability Description: Multispelling bonus limit drain increase extra dice
Multicast.Rules Text: You do not suffer increased drain for casting multiple spells in one action. Gain +1 dice to each spellcasting roll when multicasting.

Permafrost.Ability Description: Initiative damage beyond 0 is applied to enemy's next turn
Permafrost.Rules Text: Initiative damage resulting from your cold effects that would reduce an enemy's initiative below 0 is applied towards their next round's initiative.

Sculpt Spell.Rules Text: For spells with an AOE you may shape the radial aoe into either a a cylinder (F/4*STAT wide 3F/4*STAT high) cone (F*STAT ft.) line (4*F*STAT) ball (F/2  * STAT radius) or 4 cubes (F/4 * STAT ft.).

Stoke the flames.Ability Description: Increase severity of ignite by hitting a burning target
Stoke the flames.Rules Text: Burning enemies that fail the save vs. your fire abilities increase the Force of their Burning by 2 or to the Force of your fire effect whichever is higher.

Tactical Spell.Ability Description: Your area spellcasts fold around specified targets ignoring them
Tactical Spell.Rules Text: adds +1 drain any number of subjects that would be subject to the aoe spell being augmented can be designated as ignored by the spell

Acrobat.Ability Description: Move at full speed doing gymnastics at no penalty. Ignore most penalties for having hands full during gymnastics.
Acrobat.Rules Text: move at full speed doing gymnastics at no penalty. Ignore most penalties for having hands full during gymnastics.

Adaptive Resistance.Ability Description: Gain dampening/elemental dampening after taking appropriate damage type
Adaptive Resistance.Rules Text: After taking damage gain RANK damage dampening that only applies to that damage type. This resistance expires after 10*BOD minutes or when this ability is triggered again.

Adrenaline Surge.Ability Description: You are more likely to go first at the start of a round
Adrenaline Surge.Rules Text: Treat your initiative as 5 higher for determining the acting order at the start of a round.

Arresting Impact.Ability Description: Dealing damage to an enemy stops its movement
Arresting Impact.Rules Text: When you hit an enemy with an AoO or readied attack it loses all remaining movement for the turn stopping in place if it was moving. Airborne creatures may fall if they cannot hover.

Bardic Knowledge.Rules Text: For a given topic you may make a Bardic Knowledge roll of (2*RANK + INTUITION or LOGIC as relevant). The general thresholds for recalling useful information are as follows.1: Common Knowledge3: Uncommon knowledge4: Obscure / Hard to come by5: Extremely Obscure

Blandness.Ability Description: Harder to remember harder to pick out of a crowd
Blandness.Rules Text: Apply a -3 penalty to all attempts to notice you in a crowd or remember your features. This bonus does not apply if exotic clothing / gear would make you stand out.

Blindsight.Ability Description: Pinpoint awareness of things around you

Blinkstrike.Ability Description: You may teleport as part of your attack action awareness permitting
Blinkstrike.Rules Text: You may use a teleport ability as part of an attack action. Use your departure location for determining LoS.

Blood Magic.Ability Description: Soak drain with BOD take drain as health.
Blood Magic.Rules Text: Lose all sources of WIL to your drain soak dicepool. Gain BOD to your drain dicepool. You have no drain bar. When you are the recipient of healing the caster must give up health or stamina at a 1:1 rate to heal you. You take all drain damage as health damage.

Blood Mana.Ability Description: You may take drain as lethal
Blood Mana.Rules Text: You may choose to take any amount of drain you would suffer as twice its value in lethal damage.

Blunt the Storm.Ability Description: Shield bonus vs. AoE indirect effects
Blunt the Storm.Rules Text: Your shield bonus applies against area attacks

Burrowing.Ability Description: various burrow speeds limited burrow to 100% uptime
Burrowing.Rules Text: 5ft per round___________10ft per round______20ft per round________Normal Movement speed

Camoflague.Rules Text: Select a climate region this ability may be purchased multiple times once for each such region. When in chosen region you may attempt stealth checks at any time as if unobserved.

Catlike.Ability Description: Reduced falling damage better climbing jumping escape artist
Catlike.Rules Text: Reduce the effective height of all falls by 20' then halve the distance for purposes of damage sustained.

Changeling.Rules Text: Assume disguises in 12 seconds+6 on disguise+4 on mimicryGain Shapeshifter subtype

Chaotic Haversack.Ability Description: Trinkets and objects seem to end up in your backpack but you didn't put them there.
Chaotic Haversack.Rules Text: As a standard action you may pull out any simple non-magical inanimate object (rope candle etc).  You may have up to a total of 3 spontaneously generated items at a time; these items may be returned to the sack and exchanged.  Items spontaneously created are entirely mundane items posessing no magical properties.  Should a spontaneously generated item be unreturned to the sack there is a 24 hour period before that use is restored. Ability to pull out various low value items without specifically having them in inventory representing character's collection of useful odds and ends. Pull out an item based on hits: 1. basic object 2. simple item 4. complex item 5. exotic substanceDicepool of LOG+INT+3

Close and Personal.Ability Description: By closing to CQC you negate enemy's reach when using(smaller) weapons
Close and Personal.Rules Text: By entering an opponent's square (check to circumvent being pushed out) you treat that opponent as having no reach for attacks involving you and that opponent so long as you are attacking/defending with light weapons or lighter.

Deadly Momentum.Ability Description: Combat bonuses for moving each round
Deadly Momentum.Rules Text: If you move 3 or more squares during your turn your next attack made during that turn has superior ground.

Deflective Skin.Ability Description: Natural armor provides you with damage dampening against ranged attacks.
Deflective Skin.Rules Text: Damage dampening X against non-magical attacks made from ranged against you.  This ability does not protect against polearms or other reach melee attacks.

Delay Potion.Ability Description: Upon drinking a potion you can choose to delay its effects for up to BODY+WILL hours
Delay Potion.Rules Text: Upon drinking a potion you can choose to delay its effects for up to BODY+WILL hours

Diehard.Rules Text: You do not fall unconscious when your condition track is filled you still bleed out as normal.

Distraction.Rules Text: When outnumbering an enemy in melee that enemy may not take attacks of opportunity for triggers other than movement.

Driven by Pain.Ability Description: Gain 2 initiative per lethal damage you take gain 1 initiative per nonlethal damage you take
Driven by Pain.Rules Text: Gain 2 initiative per lethal damage you take gain 1 initiative per nonlethal damage you take

Durable.Rules Text: Increase your maximum health and your overflow health by 1 each.

Elusive combatant.Ability Description: first (Y) squares of movement do not provoke
Elusive combatant.Rules Text: The first (1/3/*) squares of each movement you make do not provoke attacks of opportunity.

Evasion.Ability Description: Armor encumbrance limitation avoid area effects
Evasion.Rules Text: While you are lightly encumbered you may attempt a dodge roll when subjected to an AoE you are aware of. (5) make a gymnastics check and move (X) per hit without provoking. If this places you outside the AoE you are no longer targeted by it. Additionally double your dodge skill dice on active dodges and full dodges.

Extraordinary Defender.Ability Description: Guaranteed a minimum of take 4 on parries and blocks
Extraordinary Defender.Rules Text: When rolling parry/block treat any value below the take-4 value as the take-4 value

Extraordinary Evasion.Ability Description: Guaranteed a minimum of take 4 on dodge
Extraordinary Evasion.Rules Text: When rolling dodge treat any roll below the take-4 value as the take-4 value

Extraordinary Resilience.Ability Description: Guaranteed a minimum of take 4 on chosen save
Extraordinary Resilience.Rules Text: Choose a resistance (physical mental). When rolling that resistance treat any roll below the take-4 value as the take-4 value. Rank 2: applies to both resistances

Extraordinary Skill.Ability Description: Guaranteed a minimum of take 4 on chosen skill
Extraordinary Skill.Rules Text: Choose a skill (except spellcasting or weapon skill). When rolling that skill treat any roll below the take-4 value as the take-4 value.

Fast Talker.Ability Description: No penalty for rushing Con checks. Allow for secondary con roll to avert social blunder.
Fast Talker.Rules Text: You no longer take a penalty for rushing a con attempt. You may attempt a con roll to smooth over an unsuccessful negotiation or etiquette roll.

Fearsome reputation.Rules Text: Gain +3 dice on intimidation/diplomacy/leadership checks when the subjects of such checks are aware of your reputation. Others so aware of your reputation gain a +3 bonus on checks to recognize you recall seeing you etc. so long as you are not adequately disguised.

Fickle sinew.Ability Description: All successful melee attacks against you are subject to a free disarm. Attacker's AGI + SKILL vs. BOD
Fickle sinew.Rules Text: All successful melee attacks against you are subject to a free disarm. Attacker's AGI + SKILL vs. BOD

Finger Lopper.Rules Text: Disarming an enemy subjects them to a hit at normal weapon damage net hits do not contribute to damage.

Flawless Defense.Ability Description: Any full defense action allows you to defend with any relevant dicepool of your choosing.
Flawless Defense.Rules Text: Any full defense action allows you to defend with any relevant dicepool of your choosing.

Flight.Rules Text: Ignore falling damage so long as you can manage a glide glide ratio of 2:1_____________________________________Fly up to a minute requiring 10x the amount of rest to recoup your flight capabilities. Very wide turns_____________________________________Continuous flight wide turns_____________________________________Continuous flight faster hover_____________________________________Continuous flight fastest hover turn on a dime

Food Taster.Rules Text: Your past career as a paid food taster has granted you the experience to detect poisoned food.  Additionally you are immune to venom of (idfk how poisons work but I assume it would be like catagories so like snakes vs spiders idk)Gain +4 on perception checks to notice the presence of poison. In addition you are either immune to one poison of your choosing or have a +2 bonus against all poisons.

Force of Presence.Ability Description: Increase maximum auras you can sustain
Force of Presence.Rules Text: You may sustain two auras at once

Fortunate Fool.Ability Description: All critical failures become normal failures all normal failures restore a point of luck
Fortunate Fool.Rules Text: All critical failures restore a point of luck and are reduced to normal failures subject to DM discretion. Do not apply this to trivial or nondramatic failures.

Freedom of movement.Ability Description: Bonus to resist movement impairing effects
Freedom of movement.Rules Text: 2*RANK to resist movement impairing effects (including grapples)

Go the Distance.Rules Text: Running thing Now a non action to sprint. Enemies do not gain bonus vs you when you sprint Plus something about sprint longer with no exhaustion

Hardline Negotiator.Ability Description: Allow second attempts on failed negotiations where there otherwise wouldnâ€™t be one. +3 to negotiation dicepool.
Hardline Negotiator.Rules Text: Allow second attempts on failed negotiations where there otherwise wouldnâ€™t be one.

Hawk Eyed.Rules Text: Reduce vision penalties by 3. This includes the penalty for attacking faraway targets.

Heavy Hitter.Rules Text: Reduce the threshold for inflicting knockdown with your melee attacks by 2

Helping Hand.Ability Description: Ally benefits vs foes you are in melee with
Helping Hand.Rules Text: You and your allies gain the benefits of ALLIES IN MELEE COMBAT when making ranged attacks into a melee.

Hold Breath.Ability Description: Practice and necessity has improved your lung capacity and oxygen usage
Hold Breath.Rules Text: Quadruple the time you can hold your breath for without having to roll dice. You gain a +5 bonus against inhalation based poisons.

Indomitable.Ability Description: You may take up to half the damage from every hit as drain.
Indomitable.Rules Text: You may take up to half the damage from every hit as drain.

Inevitability.Rules Text: After you miss an attack gain 2 dice on the next attack you make before the end of the next round.

init fixing.Ability Description: roll 1 extra init die at start set aside 1 die for next round
init fixing.Rules Text: Roll 1 extra initiative dice at the start of combat and choose one roll to set aside. On subsequent rounds you roll dice as normal then add this kept die and choose one die among them to set aside for the next round.

Init Growth.Rules Text: At the start of round Y reroll all initiative dice that are lower than min(Y1+rank)

Invigorate.Ability Description: Recipients of your healing gain +1 die to all checks for a short while
Invigorate.Rules Text: Recipients of your healing gain +1 die to all checks for a number of rounds equal to half the health restored rounded up.

It's all in the wrist.Ability Description: Cheat at games; manipulate dice cards
It's all in the wrist.Rules Text: You may make a palming check to make games of chance end in your favor.  Gain +4 dice to these checks you may spend a luck point to ensure a victory.  Additionally you may spend a point of luck to win a bet limited to gambling such as betting on a fight or race.  May apply circumstance bonuses at the GMs discretion.

Killing Hands.Rules Text: You can choose for your unarmed strikes to do lethal damage. Your unarmed strike is a 4/2 weapon (medium size).

Light Sleeper.Ability Description: You don't take any penalty to perception checks while sleeping you can act on the turn you wake up
Light Sleeper.Rules Text: You don't take any penalty to perception checks while sleeping you can act on the turn you wake up

Lingering Aura.Ability Description: The effects of your aura linger after affected individuals leave its zone of effect.
Lingering Aura.Rules Text: The effects of your auras persist for one round after an affected individual leaves the zone of effect.

Lore Master.Ability Description: Various bonuses granted to combat for identifying enemies
Lore Master.Rules Text: Once per combat you may attempt to recall relevant information to help combat a type of foe. Make a knowledge roll as a simple action using the appropriate skill for every two hits on this check you add +1 die to all opposed checks against the chosen type until combat ends to a maximum of half your LOGIC.

Magic resistance.Rules Text: Gain RANK dice to resist magical effects. You always roll to resist magical effects and are not considered willing. You can suppress this ability at will a free action in combat. Resuming this ability is also a free action.

magical device affinity / magic sensitiv.AbilityNames: magical device affinity / magic sensitive / aura viewing
magical device affinity / magic sensitiv.Ability Description: Affinity: Notice items are magical with hands on inspection. Glean some idea of the magic item's functionSensitive: Notice items are magica after a few moments of observationAura: Notice magical auras in addition to items discern more specific functionality of items (identify given time)
magical device affinity / magic sensitiv.Rules Text: Affinity: Notice items are magical with hands on inspection. Glean some idea of the magic item's functionSensitive: Notice items are magica after a few moments of observationAura: Notice magical auras in addition to items discern more specific functionality of items (identify given time)

Master of Poisons.Rules Text: GainKnowledge of poison craftingability to learn new poison recipes and develop your own+3 dice vs. poison effects+3 dice to identify poisons

Master smuggler.Ability Description: Bonuses on sleight of hand hiding things
Master smuggler.Rules Text: Treat unattended objects one size smaller for fitting them through tight spaces

Mingling.Rules Text: You can always attempt a stealth check when in crowds even if observed.

Natural weapons various.Ability Description: Claws Bite Tail blades spines etc
Natural weapons various.Rules Text: You gain a natural weapon. Additional features may be purchased to customize it.

Nothing Personal.Ability Description: Treated as having superior ground during a turn you have teleported.
Nothing Personal.Rules Text: After teleporting you have superior ground until the end of your turn (or end of next turn if you teleported when it wasn't your turn)

Opportunist.Ability Description: Gain +3 dice on all readied attacks and intercepts
Opportunist.Rules Text: Gain +3 dice on all readied attacks and intercepts

Pain Brings Suffering.Ability Description: Victims of your DoTs take a dicepool penalty equal to half the total ongoing damage value.
Pain Brings Suffering.Rules Text: Victims of your DoTs take a dicepool penalty equal to half the total ongoing damage value.

Pain is Temporary.Ability Description: 1 phys damage per hit is taken as nonlethal
Pain is Temporary.Rules Text: When you take 2 or more physical damage 1 point of that damage is taken as nonlethal instead.

Pain tolerance.Ability Description: Increases number of damage boxes required to acquire wound penalties
Pain tolerance.Rules Text: You require 3 + (RANK) boxes per wound penalty rather than 3.

Paragon of Skill.Ability Description: reroll all 4s for a noncombat skill can be taken multiple times
Paragon of Skill.Rules Text: reroll all 4s for a noncombat skill can be taken multiple times

Parry and Twist.Ability Description: Attempting a disarm as part of a riposte only costs (5)
Parry and Twist.Rules Text: Attempting a disarm as part of a riposte only costs (5)

Photographic memory.Ability Description: remember stuff prompt GM for refreshers of detail
Photographic memory.Rules Text: Gain 2 dice on knowledge checks to remember something. You may recall additional relevant details by prompting the GM for a clearer picture of a memory subject to GM discretion. Rolling memory is now faster (typically a free action).

Projectile deflection.Rules Text: You can parry projectile based attacks from various item size categoriesyour size +2 (arrows daggers)your size +1 (thrown weapons)your size (heavy thrown weapons powder shot weapons)

Prowess.Ability Description: Every non attack ability used increases your combat prowess
Prowess.Rules Text: Gain +1 extra dice on all defenses and weapon attacks for each non attack ability used. This bonus stacks and lasts until the end of the round.

quickdraw.Ability Description: quickdraw without check // quickdraw large items
quickdraw.Rules Text: Items that can be quickdrawn normally require no check and are drawn as a nonaction. Most items that cannot normally be quickdrawn may be attempted as a standard quickdraw (Free action roll palming vs. 2)

Ranger favored enemy.Ability Description: gain bonuses against specific enemy types
Ranger favored enemy.Rules Text: Gain (RANK) extra dice for checks pertaining to the chosen (sub)type.

Reactive Dodge.Ability Description: Shift 10ft as part of a dodge
Reactive Dodge.Rules Text: As part of a dodge or when dodging on full dodge you may move 10 ft.

Regenerating Fortitude.Rules Text: Once per turn when you directly cause damage to an enemy you heal 1 point of nonlethal damage.

Regeneration.Ability Description: Converts lethal to nonlethal over time
Regeneration.Rules Text: Convert 1 lethal to nonlethal every hour starting with smallest wounds. Regeneration can regrow severed limbs in a day.

Resist (ELEMENT).Ability Description: 2x RANK dice against (ELEMENT) effects. W: radiantU: coldB: acid darkR: fire lightningG: cold acid fire lightning

Roll with the blows.Ability Description: Gain dodge bonus after being hit
Roll with the blows.Rules Text: After you are hit by an attack and suffer damage gain 1 free hit to the next defense roll you make against an attack.

Runecarving.Ability Description: Carve magical runes to delay magical effects for use at a desired time
Runecarving.Rules Text: You cannot cast spells directly.You can scribe up to (CAST STAT)/2 runes per day given sufficient downtime. Runes are typically scribed onto small durable objects that fit in one's hand but nearly any surface can accept runes. The dicepool force and cast stat parameters of a runic spell are set when it is created. Runic spells are never affected by wound penalties.A rune must be attuned before it can be used. A rune can be attuned as part of the action of casting the stored spell. Attuning a rune costs 1 unpreventable point of drain damage. As a runecaster you may have up to (CAST STAT)/2 runes attuned at once. Non runecasters are limited to 1 rune and may only attune runes as part of the action of casting the stored spell.A rune comes with (Your drain pool / 2 / spell drain value ) uses.

Scent.Ability Description: Detect things by sense of smell
Scent.Rules Text: You can easily distinguish different scents as easily as sounds shapes and colors. This allows you to be aware of things in the general vacinity (30ft) things that have been in an area you are closely expecting (modified by circumstances).

Shadowmeld.Rules Text: You can always attempt a stealth check when in dimly lit or dark areas even if observed.

Silent as a shadow.Ability Description: Climb swim and jump extra quietly. Quiet kills
Silent as a shadow.Rules Text: You take no penalty for sneaking at normal speed. Enemies take -4 to hear most sounds you make in combat

Skirmishing Sharpshooter.Rules Text: You may treat ranged weapons as melee weapons for purposes of threatened area and related combat modifiers.

Speedloader.Rules Text: As a simple action you may reload HITS weapons on a Palming roll.

Spell drinking.Ability Description: invigorated by failed spells targeting user
Spell drinking.Rules Text: Gain 1 temp hp when you resist a hostile spell.

Spiderclimb.Ability Description: You can walk on walls as if they were level ground
Spiderclimb.Rules Text: You can walk on walls as easily as ground. Climb checks are still required thresholds are lowered.

Stinging Denial.Ability Description: Lock enemy out of ability action you counter
Stinging Denial.Rules Text: When you successfully counterspell an opponents spell or ability they cannot use that ability until after the end of their next turn.

Supreme Contortionist.Rules Text: You can contort and deform your body to fit in/through spaces smaller than normal.

Tangential Luck.Ability Description: Various secondary effects that trigger off spending points of luck
Tangential Luck.Rules Text: After you spend a point of luck you gain +1 die to all pools until the end of the current round.

Telepathic link.Rules Text: Range (LOG*10 ft). This is one way communication in which you can convey words given you and your target share a language._______________________You may attune up to LOG targets for two way communication_______________________Attuned targets can be communicated with out to LOG*100 ft

Timely Disruption.Ability Description: Readied attacks also inflict their damage as a dice pool penalty to an action they interrupt.
Timely Disruption.Rules Text: Readied attacks also inflict their damage as a dice pool penalty to an action they interrupt.

Tireless.Rules Text: Increase your maximum nonlethal health by 1.

Trap finding.Ability Description: trapfinding the dangerous ones not the anime ones
Trap finding.Rules Text: Your passive perception checks do not take the usual penalty to detect traps or other hidden/harmful mechanisms. Additionally you gain 2 dice on all checks to find such things.

Tremorsense.Ability Description: Pintpoint awareness of things moving in contact with solid objects you are also in contact with like the ground

Uncanny Awareness.Ability Description: Harder to surprise bonuses vs. attacks you aren't aware of
Uncanny Awareness.Rules Text: You can take an active defense even when surprised gain +6 dice on surprise checks initiated against you.

Underworld contact.Ability Description: It's rather easy for you to get into contact with the local criminal underground and more often than not you start out on their good side
Underworld contact.Rules Text: gain 3 dice on checks relating to interactions with or knowledge about black markets/criminal undergrounds/fences etc. You may attempt to "know a guy" if the DM permits spend 1L and you find an underground contact who starts out initially friendly.

Unmovable.Rules Text: Gain +3 dice against knockdown disarm grapple balance overrun and other effects that forcibly move you.

Untrackable.Ability Description: You cannot be tracked in natural surroundings.
