Untrackable.Rules Text: With your guidance the party may move through natural terrain using your stealth or survival check to cover up your tracks.  You are always untrackable when moving through natural terrain alone however the party cannot gain the benefit of your Untrackable ability when this is the case.

Venomous Vitality.Ability Description: succeeding on a roll vs. poison grants you 1 temp hp
Venomous Vitality.Rules Text: Whenever you succeed on a resistance roll against a poison effect gain 1 temp hp.

Wary Traversal.Rules Text: Halve damage from AoOs after armor before damage dampening.

Water Walking.Ability Description: You can walk on water as if it were solid ground
Water Walking.Rules Text: You can walk on water as if it were solid ground

If both targets are unwilling the caster must succeed on both opposed checks.Force -> Range1: 30 ft3: 40 ft5: 70 ft7: 120 ft9: 210 ft

True Seeing.Ability Description: Imbued with visions of the truth illusions and magical darkness melt from your vision and all is clear.  Negate up to HITS penalty/bonus from illusions magical or normal darkness concealment etc
True Seeing.Rules Text: SUST SELFF/2Ignore up to HITS penalty on visual perception rolls to a maximum of FORCECasting this spell is a simple action

Truelight.Ability Description: Reduce vision penalties in an area
Truelight.Rules Text: AOE SUST optional:SELFF/2 + 1 (5ft)+1 per additional 5ftCasting this spell is a simple actionreduce visibility penalties by FORCE.

Wall of Force.Ability Description: 1 point of Armor and Structure rating per hit. Barrier regenerates at start of next turn.
Wall of Force.Rules Text: SUSTF/2 + 31 point of Armor and Structure rating per hit. Barrier regenerates at start of next turn.

Warp World.Ability Description: All allies and enemies in the encounter randomly swap positions
Warp World.Rules Text: INST AOEF/2+2All creatures that fail to save or are willing within F*M*3 ft (round up for squares) randomly swap places. Resolution advice: remove all subjects and mark their locations roll one by one for each subject's reentry to a location after assigning each location a number.

Word of Binding.Ability Description: Save or suck no physical actions
Word of Binding.Rules Text: SUST TRGTF/2 + 4Target resists with mental resWhile the target is subject to Word of Binding it is paralyzed and can take no physical actions.At end of turn target can use a free action to make an active mental res roll vs. the effect if successful the effect ends.The effect also ends after the target has rolled (FORCE) additional saves against it.

1v1 me bro.Ability Description: Ignore full defense free parries vs. stuff you are fighting
1v1 me bro.Rules Text: You ignore an enemy's full defense with melee attacks. After attacking an enemy the next parry you attempt against that enemy this round costs (0).

Adroit riposte.Ability Description: bonus vs. enemies who are foiled by your parry // only costs (5) to riposte
Adroit riposte.Rules Text: When your parry prevents an attack from hitting add (NET HITS) to your next attack against that opponent. It only costs (5) to make a riposte. Enemies do not benefit from reach when you are riposting.

Berserker.Rules Text: Your dice explode on attack actions. All active defenses cost an additional (5). You cannot take the total defense action.

Celeritas Dominus.Ability Description: When casting a spell extra mobility options become available
Celeritas Dominus.Rules Text: When casting a...\Red: Shift 1; Blue: tele 10ft; RU: choose oneWhen casting a... \Red: Shift 2; Blue: tele 15ft; RU; both

Counterspell Stance.Rules Text: Counterspelling costs (5). You are always making passive perception checks to detect magic within 10* (cast stat) feet of you and are aware of what spell is being cast.

dodge stance.Rules Text: Full dodge is now (5) or a simple action. Every time you attempt a dodge you may shift 5ft after resolving the dodge.

Horde Culling Stance.Ability Description: bonuses when fighting multiple opponents ignore some penalties from being outnumbered
Horde Culling Stance.Rules Text: 2 extra dice on each attack per target when attacking multiple targets with melee. Opponents do not get bonus dice for outnumbering you in melee.

Mountain Stance.Ability Description: Shield bonus is added to armor full block is now (5)
Mountain Stance.Rules Text: Add your shield bonus to any calculation that includes your armor. The full block defensive action only costs (5).

Never Outnumbered.Ability Description: Bonus to evasion for each enemy in sight up to X
Never Outnumbered.Rules Text: Gain 1 die on dodge and full dodge for each enemy within 60' (LOS and LOE required)

Quickfire Storm.Ability Description: Whenever you cast a spell that normally deals no damage you may chuck a firebolt at an opponent
Quickfire Storm.Rules Text: After you resolve a spellcast that was not an INST or DIRECT combat spell you may fire a 3F lightning bolt as per the spell you automatically resist all of its drain.

Rooted Bulwark.Ability Description: While in this stance you resist all attempts to be moved against your will.  Additionally at the end of your turns vines grow from the ground attempting to root all adjacent enemies in place.  If continuously rooted enemies will become entangled and eventually engulfed in vines and plants.  This stance is ended if the roots are hacked away and is usable the next day or when your nature is regenerated (lol idk what I'm thinking honestly feel free to rationalize this a lot)
Rooted Bulwark.Rules Text: Gain +4 dice to resist all attempts to be moved against your will. At the end of the round vines grow out from your body attempting to root all adjacent enemes in place (Your weapon skill or spellcasting + STR vs. enemy grapple). If an enemy is already rooted the check is instead to entangle. If already entangled the check is to engulf and imprison.The vines can be hacked away (BOD/2+4 health BOD*2 barrier rating)

The Blood Tells.Ability Description: Hear and feel all heartbeats within an extended range.  The range increases with blood for the blood god and lust for the lust throne.  Additionally gain a bonus on active bluff detection against characters with a heartrate.
The Blood Tells.Rules Text: All heartbeats within (CHA*5 ft) can be heard (DC 2). Gain +4 dice on judge intentions rolls against targets that you are aware of who have a heartbeat.

Threatening Archer.Ability Description: Opponents that move within (Y) of you provoke
Threatening Archer.Rules Text: Treat all squares within (AGI/2)*5 as threatened by your ranged weapon for purposes of opportunity attacks.

Unyielding Stance.Ability Description: Ignore wound penalties falling unconscious as long as you hold your ground or for one day WHICHE ER COMES FIRST. If at any point your overflow is filled during this time you die when this benefit ends.
Unyielding Stance.Rules Text: Ignore wound penalties falling unconscious as long as you hold your ground or for one day WHICHEVER COMES FIRST. If at any point your overflow is filled during this time you die when this benefit ends.

Vengeful Bulwark.Rules Text: Gain your shield bonus to your dice pool on your attack against a target you have successfully blocked in the past round. You may spend (5) to make an attack against a target you have succesfully blocked this attack is made with your shield. (reach 0 buckler = 1 dv med shield = 3 dv heavy shield = 4dv tower shield = 6dv)

Willow stance.Ability Description: Get +4 on defense after a turn in which you do not attack. If you did not attack last turn you have +4 on your next attack. If you do nothing during your turn you do not lose initiative.
Willow stance.Rules Text: You have +4 defensive dice if you did not attack since your last turn. If you have not attacked since your last turn you have +4 dice on your next attack. You can pass your turn once per round at zero initiative loss.

Undead.Ability Description: Become undead with benefits and drawbacks. Multiple options. Vampire (necropolitan) mummy skeleton death knight?
Undead.Rules Text: You permanently become undead gaining benefits and drawbacks according to the specific type selected.General:An undead's BOD does not contribute to its overflow track. Thus by default an undead dies when its physical wounds equal or exceed its health.Undead are immune to poisons diseases life drain effects effects that depend upon physical pain/pleasure/discomfort and most death effects.

Bonemonger.Ability Description: Successful attacks generate a temp hp shield can detonate temp hp shield
Bonemonger.Rules Text: Successful attacks generate 1 temp hp. You may detonate your temp hp discharging the buff as a complex action to deal BOD/2+temp hp DV as an AoE attack (attacking with your weapon skill or spellcasting dicepool). This is a body buff.

Elemental Body (Air).Ability Description: Flight increased movement speed deflection immunity to gases/inhaled poisons wind blast discharge

Iceblock.Rules Text: (10) Immobilize yourself in a block of ice as an interrupt. The ice has (CAST STAT) health and uses your soak pool. The ice disperses when its health reaches zero or you spend a complex action to dismiss it. Excess damage beyond the ice's health is dealt as nonlethal to you.

Last Word.Ability Description: spend init to prevent enemies from reacting to your nonaction
Last Word.Rules Text: (5) as part of a nonaction ability. No abilities can trigger in response to the activation or resolution of the empowered ability.

Nightmare Blade.Rules Text: Make a melee attack at -3DV the target resists with mental save instead of dodge/block/parry.

Bomb making.Ability Description: Create rudimentary explosive devices for battle

Keen Eyed Tracker.Ability Description: Bonus on tracking negate penalties by using multiple methods to discern concealed tracks

Regional Adaptation.Ability Description: Pick a region/climate bonuses for enduring things typical to the area. Knowledge about area etc

Unyielding Focus.Ability Description: Can't be counterspelled can't be foiled
Unyielding Focus.Rules Text: Your abilities cannot be countered or interrupted.

Restorative Resonance.Ability Description: Whenever you heal an ally trigge a heal on another nearby ally
Restorative Resonance.Rules Text: Whenever an effect of yours heals an ally heal another ally within 30' of one of the original healing recipients for 2. This ability can't trigger itself

Alarm.Ability Description: Sets a ward upon an area that if it detects things that meet specified conditions sets off an alarm.

Antipathy.Ability Description: Repell types of creatures from an area

Chaosmorph.Ability Description: The target is turned into a dimminutive animal or a giant beast as polymorph or dino/bear/rhino (5/5)
Chaosmorph.Rules Text: INST SUST TRGTF/2+1 F=BOD+SIZEMODOn success vs. 2x targets BOD the victim is changed. Flip a coin.Heads: (1/1)Tails: (5/5)

Detention.Ability Description: Choose Spells or maneuvers target can't use the chosen on its next turn.
Detention.Rules Text: INST TRGTF/2+2Target opposes with MENTALNeed F+net hits > target's WIL *2Casting this spell is a simple actionOn success choose Maneuvers or Spells. The target cannot use the selected type of ability on its next turn.

Earthshape.Rules Text: F/2 + 3Shift up to 200kg of earth per net hit forming it with minimal control over finer details.

Resist Energy.Ability Description: Create ward that absorbs energy damage of a type specified at casting

Seeping Deluge.Ability Description: A flash flood hits the area. Water swells swallowing up the ground.  Creatures must seek saftey among trees boulders or rooves.  The deluge may take hours or days to pass depending on how flat the surrounding region is.

Sleetstorm.Ability Description: Blinding freezing sleet pelts down from the skys. A sleetstorm begins.  If it is summertime a hailstorm may appear instead.  Hailstorms hurt and break things but dont do anything else.  Sleetstorms make the ground icy and extingquish campfires torches etc as well as reducing vision down to 10ft.  Sleetstorms rarely last more than a day but in harsh winters can remain for a week.

Time Spiral.Ability Description: All creatures involved in combat reroll initiative
Time Spiral.Rules Text: AoE INSTF/2+12All creatures in the current combat reroll initiative.

Tornado.Ability Description: The wind whips up injuring flying creatures and blowing stuff over.  A windstorm picks up in the region blowing sails grounding flyers and overall making a ruccus of anything not tied down.  Lasts as long as it takes a high pressure system to dissapate

Zone of Silence.Rules Text: F/2 + 4Sets a threshold of (F) for casting opposed by

Mark.Ability Description: Mark target easily track target bonuses against marked target

Crunching Bullrush.Ability Description: Deal damage when bullrushing something into an obstacle

Detaining Strike.Ability Description: Attack inflicts dice penalty on enemy's attacks for the rest of the round

Devour.Ability Description: Swallow whole enemies much smaller than you

Fatespin.Ability Description: Force an enemy to choose what they will do on their next turn this locks them into those actions.

Find the Gap.Ability Description: Bypass armor in a moment of opportunity

Grand Bend.Rules Text: Make a line attack (AoE) with your ranged weapon at -6 dicepool out to the end of your weapon's short range. Take Aim bonuses are doubled for this attack.

Invoke Paragon.Ability Description: spend luck (or whatever) immediate action gain temporary immunity from death effects.

Puff of Smoke.Ability Description: Flash powder smoke bomb or a magical breath; whatever the source of the distraction the user has dissapeared
Puff of Smoke.Rules Text: As a simple action or for (5) as part of movement you may toss the flask to generate a 10' cube of smoke that lasts until the start of your next turn. The smoke applies a -2 vision penalty to see into or through it. (scale cooldown with investment or go with daily charges?)

Redirecting parry.Ability Description: cause enemy to hit themselves with their weapon on a successful parry
Redirecting parry.Rules Text: (5) as part of attempting a parry. If your parry is successful the attacker must soak the unmodified DV of their weapon.

Spellshank.Ability Description: Deal reduced damage possibly steal and cast spell target recently cast

Volatilize.Ability Description: double dice 1s count as -1s if 1/4 are 1s auto fail

Wild Ricochet.Ability Description: Cast a copy of a spell being cast and redirect the targets of the spell being cast

Cloudy Conjuration.Ability Description: Create a fog cloud after casting a conjuration spell

Covert Poisoning.Ability Description: Much easier to poison unsuspecting targets

Elemental Charge.Ability Description: When you make a charge attack while you have an element imbued in your weapons you leave a lingering trail of that element.
Elemental Charge.Rules Text: Prerequisite: an Imbue (element) ability.You may spend (5) to activate one of your Imbue(element) buffs as part of a charge.When you charge with an imbue(element) buff active you leave behind a lingering trail of the element in all spaces you exit as part of the charge. This trail lasts until the end of the round and automatically hits creatures that enter cross or end their turn inside it dealing (2+STAT??) damage of the appropriate element.

Fed by Fear.Ability Description: Generate expendable offensive dice when you successfully fear an enemy

Find the weakspot.Ability Description: Various bonuses granted to combat for identifying fighting styles armor weapons

Peerless Tracker.Ability Description: Track all manner of things even magical auras

Speed Read.Ability Description: You can read at astonishing speed
Speed Read.Rules Text: You can read a full page of text in six seconds getting a general idea of its contents.

Titan Toppler.Ability Description: Climb enemies much larger than you benefits tactics

Unbalancing.Ability Description: Gain (bonus) against enemies you have recently dodged
Unbalancing.Rules Text: Gain +2 dice on trip grapple and disarm checks against enemies you dodged since the end of the last round.

Scrying.Ability Description: View location individual or objects remotely from great distance

Elemental Trap.Ability Description: Create elemental attack that can be triggered after an arming time

Fly.Ability Description: Causes subject(s) to fly successes influence speed/maneuverability of flight

Phase Lock.Ability Description: Target is bound to this dimension cannot teleport or phase.

Phase Lock Field.Ability Description: Region is warded against teleportation and extradimensional access.

Thoughtsway.Ability Description: mind affecting to determine target's next attack

Transmorgriphy Snake.Ability Description: Turn linked chain or rope into a snake.  Can be used to release shackles or rope bonds.  Snake can be venomous if (G).

Fusion.Ability Description: Temporarily merge with target willing ally forming a fusion of stats and abilities.

Spellcatching/Spelltheft.Ability Description: Steal and hold spell effect to reuse later

Turn X (undead etc).Ability Description: Repel abhorrent entities of a specific type varporize weaker entities

Volley.Ability Description: Fire multiple projectiles as one attack

Sense Heretic.Ability Description: Detect heresy as appropriate for your viewpoint

Shield Push.Ability Description: Enemies you hit with your shield are subject to a free push attempt

Artillery Usage.Ability Description: Crew understand use ballista cannon boardplank

Astral Readings.Ability Description: star reading navigation cardinal direction weather events

Fencing and Smuggling.Ability Description: Abiliity to disguise goods and convince buyers that said goods are not stolen

Geometric interpolation.Ability Description: Feel the tectonics in the earth shape and bend them to your will

Predict Storm.Ability Description: With some % of accuracy predict storms (hurricane sandstorm and more)

Shot and Blade.Ability Description: Duel wield firing a one handed ranged weapon and a one handed sword. May have different targets no penalties or provokes from shooting ranged

Cloud of Knives.Ability Description: Conjure a variable amount of knives that you can fire off individually as an attack

Inner Focus.Ability Description: Holding focus mechanics bonuses while holding focus can be shaken out of focus increasingly hard to sustain focus

Control Plants.Ability Description: Command or Rebuke plant creatures-your WIL vs. ??
Control Plants.Rules Text: As description.  Alternatively some sort of plant affinity plant growing and other naturey things

Quake.Ability Description: Knock prone damage vs. those on ground

Shifting Form.Ability Description: Pick a new adaptation each time you roll init

Fade Strike.Ability Description: Make an attack move after the attack
Fade Strike.Rules Text: Make an attack net hits don't contribute to damage. Shift up to half your speed after the attack.

Singe & Cauterize.Ability Description: Dealing direct fire damage triggers a targeted heal on an ally. Healing triggers a targeted fire bolt.
Singe & Cauterize.Rules Text: Body Buff. Dealing direct fire damage to an enemy triggers a targeted heal on an ally within (CHA*10 ft) for up to half the damage dealt. Healing an ally triggers a targeted firebolt (DV = 2x heal) attack (spellcasting) at an enemy in range.

Unsettle.Ability Description: Startle an enemy out of their action but they act swiftly afterwards
Unsettle.Rules Text: Simple action. Target an enemy. The next simple or complex action they attempt before your next turn triggers an attack from you. This attack does no damage on a successful hit instead negating their action. On their next turn the enemy gains 15 initiative (regardless of hit or miss).

Implement Focus.Ability Description: You cannot cast without your implement. Choose an implement gain minor benefits from it

Think You're Scary?.Ability Description: Resist fear retalliate against failed fear effects.
Think You're Scary?.Rules Text: Act as if your fear state was 1 lower. Your max fear state is increased by 1. You passively roll active mental against all fear effects. After succeeding on a mental res vs. a fear effect you may spend (5) as an interrupt to attempt intimidation vs. the source of the triggering fear.

Noncommital Blow.Ability Description: if this attack misses regain a simple action
Noncommital Blow.Rules Text: Make an attack if it misses you regain a simple action.

Overdrive.Ability Description: costs drain to trigger various general combat bonuses

Time is Mana.Ability Description: Can spend drain to cover init costs for U abilities
Time is Mana.Rules Text: Spend 2 drain per (5) of a blue ability

Manacleave.Rules Text: Make an attack net hits do not contribute to damage. Target soaks with mental soak. On hit one of the target's buffs (chosen randomly) ends. ___________________________Half net hits buffs are removed___________________________Half net hits also contribute to damage

Generous Enchancements.Ability Description: Share the effects of one ongoing buff you are subject to with all allies in range of this aura.

Time is Mana.Rules Text: Spend 2 drain per (5) of a blue ability
